scripts.build:accsetup: npm --prefix ../utils/account-setup i && npm run --prefix ../utils/account-setup build && mkdir -p dist/account-setup && cp -r ../utils/account-setup/dist/* dist/account-setup/
scripts.build:hook: npm --prefix ../ i && npm run --prefix ../ build && cp -r ../dist/* dist/
scripts.build:self: npm i && npm run lint && ncc build index-manager.js --minify -o dist
scripts.build: npm run build:self && npm run build:accsetup && npm run build:hook
scripts.bundle: rm -rf dist && npm run build && cp -r dist registry-index && cp index-manager.json$([ -z $npm_config_mode ] || [ $npm_config_mode = 'dev' ] || echo .$npm_config_mode) registry-index/ && mkdir registry-index/service-acc && cp -r service-acc/firebase-sa-key.json$([ -z $npm_config_mode ] || [ $npm_config_mode = 'dev' ] || echo .$npm_config_mode) registry-index/service-acc && cp run-registry-index.sh registry-index/ && ([ -z $npm_config_mode ] || [ $npm_config_mode = 'dev' ] || echo $npm_config_mode > registry-index/.env) && tar cfz dist/registry-index.tar.gz registry-index && rm -r registry-index
